Name: Lucy Wylde
Job/Team Function: Head of Legal and Compliance team, responsible for the provision of legal advice and governance and compliance support for all APA activities. The post holder sits on the Advisory Board of the APA.

Name: Ion Dagtoglou
Job/Team Function: Head of Investment Management Team, responsible for reviewing the Participant Bank's compliance with the Scheme rules, asset management performance and individual asset decisions. The post holder sits on the Advisory Board of the APA.

Name: Bill Dickinson
Job/Team Function: Executive Head of the APA responsible for the strategic direction of the Agency. Reporting to 2nd Perm Secretary, HM Treasury

Name: Brian Scammell
Job Title: Chief Credit Officer - Commercial Real Estate
Job/Team Function: Responsible for making credit and disposal decisions and leading credit analysis in the subject area. The post holder sits on the Credit Committee.
